lead_paragraph: ANDREADIS--Michelle, passed away on July 2, 2016. Beloved wife of John. Loving mother of Davide. Dear daughter of Marisa and Barry Tenzer. Granddaughter of the late Honorable Herbert and Florence Tenzer. Sister of Stephen Tenzer and the late Maria Tenzer. Daughterin-law of the late Barbara and John Andreadis. Niece of Diane (Michael) Schachter. Sister-in-law of Eleni Andreadis and Charles Lambiotte. Rest in peace. Services Friday 1pm at "The Riverside" 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Interment to follow at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY. 1/3
